name: Jet Chicken Cutler
description:
Description:

Jet Chicken Cutler was a game created for an Atari 2600 2017 GameJam. It is a reimagining of Flappy Bird as it would have played on an Atari 2600 through a nostalgic goggle filter. Built as a pixel-perfect replica of the modern style game with multiple levels including new enemies and obstacles, the original endless mode and several new characters to unlock and play with.


Key Features:
  • 5 Unlockable Levels
  • Endless Unlockable Mode
  • Unlockable Characters
  • Easy to Pick Up/ Hard to Master Learning Curve
Controls:

Controls are similar to the original Flappy Bird. Left-Click on your mouse to fly up and avoid obstacles.

Theme Song & Music by Lauren Pham
Programmed & Developed by Olaf "RookTKO" Minkowicz
